SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_nickname AS userNickname, u.user_profile_img AS userProfileImg, j.job_start_date AS jobStartDate, j.job_deadline AS jobDeadline, u.user_position AS userPosition, u.user_career AS userCareer, COALESCE(c.comment_count, 0) AS CommentCount, COALESCE(v.view_count, 0) AS ViewCount FROM user u INNER JOIN job_search j ON u.user_id = j.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM comment GROUP BY job_id ) c ON j.job_id = c.job_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS view_count FROM view GROUP BY job_id ) v ON j.job_id = v.job_id

SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_nickname AS userNickname, u.user_profile_img AS userProfileImg, p.pf_title AS title, p.pf_location AS location, p.pf_start_date AS startdate, p.pf_deadline AS deadline, p.pf_agerating AS agerationg, p.pf_runningtime AS runningTime, p.pf_thumbnail AS thmbnail, COALESCE(c.comment_count, 0) AS CommentCount, COALESCE(v.view_count, 0) AS ViewCount FROM user u inner JOIN performance p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pf_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM comment GROUP BY pf_id ) c ON p.pf_id = c.pf_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pf_id, COUNT(*) AS view_count FROM view GROUP BY pf_id ) v ON p.pf_id = v.pf_id
